changeSet.author: Alex
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE hist_regions( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

changeSet.author: Andrei
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM hist_regions; INSERT INTO hist_regions (name) VALUES ('Dobrogea'), ('Muntenia'), ('Oltenia'), ('Moldova'), ('Bucovina'), ('Maramures'), ('Ardeal'), ('Crisana'), ('Banat');

changeSet.author: Alex
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE ethno( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (hist_region_id) REFERENCES hist_regions(id)
)

changeSet.author: Andrei
